cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_1_2: Show visual guide for cutting shape at 1/2 mark
cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_1_3: Show visual guide for cutting shape at 1/3 mark
cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_2_3: Show visual guide for cutting shape at 2/3 mark
cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_1_4: Show visual guide for cutting shape at 1/4 mark
cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_3_4: Show visual guide for cutting shape at 3/4 mark
cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_1_6: Show visual guide for cutting shape at 1/6 mark
cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_2_6: Show visual guide for cutting shape at 2/6 mark
cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_4_6: Show visual guide for cutting shape at 4/6 mark
cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_5_6: Show visual guide for cutting shape at 5/6 mark
cutting_guides.A_cut_hint_8: Show visual guide for cutting shape into eighths

automatic_cuts.A_cut_8: Make a cut at 1/2 mark, then cut each half into fourths to create eighths.

automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_1_2: Place tick at 1/2 mark on number line
automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_1_3: Place tick at 1/3 mark on number line
automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_2_3: Place tick at 2/3 mark on number line
automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_1_4: Place tick at 1/4 mark on number line
automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_3_4: Place tick at 3/4 mark on number line
automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_1_6: Place tick at 1/6 mark on number line
automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_2_6: Place tick at 2/6 mark on number line
automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_4_6: Place tick at 4/6 mark on number line
automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_5_6: Place tick at 5/6 mark on number line
automatic_tick_placement.A_place_tick_8: Place tick at 1/2 mark, then place ticks to divide each half into fourths to create eighths

comparison_support.A_compare: Compare all the parts of the first or the top shape with equal parts
comparison_support.A_compare_shaded: Compare the shaded parts of the first or the top shape with equal parts
comparison_support.B_compare_shaded: Compare the shaded parts of the second shape with unequal parts
comparison_support.C_compare_shaded: Compare the shaded parts of the third shape with unequal parts
comparison_support.D_compare_shaded: Compare the shaded parts of the fourth shape with unequal parts
comparison_support.A_B_compare_shaded: Compare the shaded parts of the shapes of the first shape with the second shape
comparison_support.selected_compare: Compare parts of the selected shape
comparison_support.selected_compare_shaded: Compare the shaded parts of the selected shape
comparison_support.selected_compare_smallest: Compare the smallest part to the largest part of the shape that the student selected.

shading_support.A_highlight_0: Highlight the first part (index 0) to guide shading

counting_support.A_count: Count and label the parts of the first or the top shape
counting_support.B_count: Count and label all unequal parts in the second shape
counting_support.C_count: Count and label all unequal parts in the third shape
counting_support.D_count: Count and label all unequal parts in the fourth shape
counting_support.A_count_shaded: Count and label the shaded parts
counting_support.B_count_shaded: Count and label the shaded parts of the second shape
counting_support.C_count_shaded: Count and label the shaded parts of the third shape
counting_support.D_count_shaded: Count and label the shaded parts of the fourth shape
counting_support.A_arrow: Draws an arrow from 0 to the shaded tick on a number line to help count the fraction
counting_support.selected_count: Count and label the parts of the shape that the student selected

scaffolding_levels.medium: Provides visual guides or highlights to help students complete the task themselves
scaffolding_levels.high: Automatically completes the step for the student to demonstrate the correct answer

event_categories.cutting_guides: Visual assistance for partitioning shapes into equal parts
event_categories.automatic_cuts: Complete the partitioning automatically for the student
event_categories.tick_placement_guides: Visual assistance for placing ticks on number lines to create equal intervals
event_categories.automatic_tick_placement: Complete the tick placement automatically for the student
event_categories.comparison_support: Help identify and compare equal versus unequal parts
event_categories.shading_support: Assistance with shading parts to represent fractions
event_categories.counting_support: Help count total parts or shaded parts to understand fractions
